     <script>
      var jzTagManager = new jztm.JuntozTagManager();
        var jzConfigurationManager = new ConfigurationManager();

        // When returning from facebook login the url is modified by adding the characters "#_=_"
        // The following code solves this problem.
        if (window.location.hash && window.location.hash == '#_=_') {
            if (window.history && history.pushState) {
                window.history.pushState("", document.title, window.location.pathname);
            } else {
                // Prevent scrolling by storing the page's current scroll offset
                var scroll = {
                    top: document.body.scrollTop,
                    left: document.body.scrollLeft
                };
                window.location.hash = '';
                // Restore the scroll offset, should be flicker free
                document.body.scrollTop = scroll.top;
                document.body.scrollLeft = scroll.left;
            }
        }

        //Facebook Pixel Function
        !(function (f, b, e, v, n, t, s) {
            if (f.fbq) return; n = f.fbq = function () {
                n.callMethod ? n.callMethod.apply(n, arguments) : n.queue.push(arguments)
            }; if (!f._fbq) f._fbq = n;
            n.push = n; n.loaded = !0; n.version = '2.0'; n.queue = []; t = b.createElement(e); t.async = !0;
            t.src = v; s = b.getElementsByTagName(e)[0]; s.parentNode.insertBefore(t, s)
        })(window, document, 'script', 'https://connect.facebook.net/en_US/fbevents.js');


        //Google Analytics Function
        (function (i, s, o, g, r, a, m) {
            i['GoogleAnalyticsObject'] = r; i[r] = i[r] || function () {
                (i[r].q = i[r].q || []).push(arguments)
            }, i[r].l = 1 * new Date(); a = s.createElement(o),
                m = s.getElementsByTagName(o)[0]; a.async = 1; a.src = g; m.parentNode.insertBefore(a, m)
        })(window, document, 'script', 'https://www.google-analytics.com/analytics.js', 'ga');

        // Google Tag Manager Function
        jztm.GoogleTagManagerRenderer.fn = (function (w, d, s, l, i) {
            w[l] = w[l] || []; w[l].push({
                'gtm.start': new Date().getTime(), event: 'gtm.js'
            }); var f = d.getElementsByTagName(s)[0],
                j = d.createElement(s), dl = l != 'dataLayer' ? '&l=' + l : ''; j.async = true; j.src =
                    'https://www.googletagmanager.com/gtm.js?id=' + i + dl + '&nc=' + new Date().getTime(); f.parentNode.insertBefore(j, f);
        });

        // Google Analytics Definition

        // GTM Definition
 jztm.GoogleTagManagerRenderer.fn(window, document, 'script', 'dataLayer', 'GTM-M8PKZG'); 
        var jztmData = '[{"controllerId":-1,"dataLayerName":"dataLayerJz","description":"Juntoz","sticky":true,"renderers":[{"key":"gtm","value":"GTM-M8J2Z63"},{"key":"fbq","value":"271305576577148"}],"dataFilters":[{"key":"storeId","value":-1}]}]';
        var serviceBusConn = 'Endpoint=sb://juntoz-esb-srv-production.servicebus.windows.net/;SharedAccessKeyName=RootManageSharedAccessKey;SharedAccessKey=Ucv51SSZF3XfX60H/xOEPTYJhuBvc8sOvno+dD9j/7g=';
        var queueName = 'userinteractionqueue';

        jzConfigurationManager.applyControllers(jzTagManager, jztmData, serviceBusConn, queueName);

    <div id="sub-container-title">

    <div id="sub-container-content">

  <script type="text/javascript">
   document.getElementById("sub-container-title").addEventListener("click", () => {
        document.getElementById("first-container").style.animation = "mainBack 0.3s forwards";
        document.getElementById("sub-container").style.animation = "subPush 0.3s forwards";
    });    

    /*document.getElementById("btn-close").css("margin-left", btnCloseMarginCalc + "px");*/

    function goToSubContainer(titleChileId, childId) {
        let subCategoryTitleContainer = document.getElementById("sub-container-title");
        let subCategoryContainer = document.getElementById("sub-container-content");
        let categoryChildTitleContainer = document.getElementById(titleChileId);
        let categoryChildContainer = document.getElementById(childId);

        // copy content from childcontainer to sub category content
        subCategoryTitleContainer.innerHTML = categoryChildTitleContainer.innerHTML;
        subCategoryContainer.innerHTML = categoryChildContainer.innerHTML;

        document.getElementById("first-container").style.animation = "mainAway 0.3s forwards";
        document.getElementById("sub-container").style.animation = "subBack 0.3s forwards";
    }
  </script>
  <noscript>
   <iframe height="0" src="https://www.googletagmanager.com/ns.html?id=GTM-M8PKZG" style="display:none;visibility:hidden" width="0">
   </iframe>
  </noscript>
  <header id="header">
   <div class="top-bar__add-to-cart">
    <span>
     <i class="fa fa-check">
     </i>
     Producto agregado al carrito
    </span>
   </div>
   <nav class="navbar navbar-juntoz navbar-fixed-top" id="navbar">
    <div class="dropdownSeller">
     <div class="container">
      <div class="popup-overlay" id="vendor-popup">
       <div class="popup">
        <a class="close" href="javascript:void(0);">
         ×
        </a>
        <div class="content">
         ¿Desea cerrar sesión?
        </div>
        <br/>
        <div class="btn-content">
         <a class="logout" href="https://juntoz.com/logoutVendor?returnUrl=kiosko">
          Cerrar Sesión
         </a>
        </div>
        <div class="btn-content1">
         <a class="logout1" href="javascript:void(0);">
          Cancelar
         </a>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
    </div>
    <script>
     // Get the modal
    var modal = document.getElementById('vendor-popup');

    // Get the button that opens the modal
    var btn = document.getElementById('closeVendorSession');

    // Get the <a> element that closes the modal
    var closeSpan = document.getElementsByClassName('close')[0];

    // Get the <a> element that closes the modal (option Cancelar)
    var closeBtn = document.getElementsByClassName('btn-content1')[0];

    // when the user clicks the button, open the modal
    btn.onclick = function () {
        modal.style.display = 'block';
    }

    // when the user clicks on (x), close the modal
    closeSpan.onclick = function () {
        modal.style.display = 'none';
    }

    // when the user clicks on Cancelar, close the modal
    closeBtn.onclick = function () {
        modal.style.display = 'none';
    }
    </script>

                <div>
                 <h2 class="section-title text-center">
                  Tiendas destacadas
                 </h2>
                 <div class="featured-stores-search__slider" id="featured-stores-slider">
                  <div class="featured-stores-search__slider__item">
                   <ul class="list-inline list-unstyled">
                    <li class="text-center">
                     <a href="https://efe.juntoz.com/?bn=logo-tiendasdestacadas&amp;cmp=efe" title="">
                      <img alt='class="img-responsive"' src="https://juntozstgsrvproduction.blob.core.windows.net/cms-images/141x68_141x68_efe_890974.jpg"/>
                     </a>

          <script>
           var viewport = document.querySelector("meta[name=viewport]");
    document.getElementById("inputSearchV2").onfocus = function () {
        viewport.setAttribute('content', 'width=device-width,  initial-scale=1.0, user-scalable=0');
    };

    function rollback() {
        viewport.setAttribute('content', ' initial-scale=1.0, user-scalable=1');
    }
          </script>

           var StoreId = null;
          </script>
          <script type="text/javascript">
           var homeUrl = "https://juntoz.com/";
            var scheme = "https://";
          </script>
          <script>
           var viewport = document.querySelector("meta[name=viewport]");
    document.getElementById("inputSearchV2").onfocus = function () {
        viewport.setAttribute('content', 'width=device-width,  initial-scale=1.0, user-scalable=0');
    };

    function rollback() {
        viewport.setAttribute('content', ' initial-scale=1.0, user-scalable=1');
    }
          </script>
         </form>
         <!-- /ko -->
        </div>
        <div class="search-bar__list">
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
     <!-- /ko -->
    </div>
    <script>
     document.getElementById("countdown").style.display = "none";

    // The data/time we want to countdown to
    var strDate = "07/18/22 0:00:00";
    var timeleft = "-4769153155";

    // Run countdown every second
    var countdown = setInterval(function () {

        timeleft -= 1000;

        // Calculating the days, hours, minutes and seconds left
        var days = Math.floor(timeleft / (1000 * 3600 * 24));
        var hours = Math.floor(timeleft % (1000 * 3600 * 24) / (1000 * 3600));
        var minutes = Math.floor(timeleft % (1000 * 3600) / (1000 * 60));
        var seconds = Math.floor(timeleft % (1000 * 60) / 1000);

        // Result is output to the specific element
        document.getElementById("days").innerHTML = days.toLocaleString('es-PE', { minimumIntegerDigits: 2 })
        document.getElementById("hours").innerHTML = hours.toLocaleString('es-PE', { minimumIntegerDigits: 2 })
        document.getElementById("mins").innerHTML = minutes.toLocaleString('es-PE', { minimumIntegerDigits: 2 })
        document.getElementById("secs").innerHTML = seconds.toLocaleString('es-PE', { minimumIntegerDigits: 2 })
        document.getElementById("countdown").style.display = "block";

        // Hide countdown when is over
        if (timeleft < 0) {
            clearInterval(countdown);
            document.getElementById("days").innerHTML = ""
            document.getElementById("hours").innerHTML = ""
            document.getElementById("mins").innerHTML = ""
            document.getElementById("secs").innerHTML = ""
            document.getElementById("countdown").style.display = "none";
        }

        var navbarHeight = document.getElementById('navbar').clientHeight;
        document.getElementById("main-container").style.paddingTop = navbarHeight - 1 + "px";
        document.getElementById("main-container").style.marginTop = "0px";

    }, 1000);
    </script>
   </nav>
   <script type="text/javascript">
    var userId = '';
    var userEmail = '';
    var sideMenuIcon = document.getElementById("hm-icon-container");

    // TODO: header menu should be a component
    var insideCoverHamburguerElement = document.getElementById("hm-button");
    insideCoverHamburguerElement.addEventListener("click", sideBarEvent);

    function sideBarEvent() {
        if (sideMenuIcon.classList.contains("hm-show-icon")) {
            showSideBarRightEvent();
        } else {
            hideSideBarRightEvent();

        }
    }

    function showSideBarRightEvent() {
        let bodyNodeHTML = document.getElementsByTagName("body")[0];
        let backgroundOverLay = document.getElementById("overlay");
        let closeBtn = document.getElementById("close-btn");

        document.getElementById("juntoz-sidenav").style.animation = "expand 0.3s forwards";
        // Overlay
        backgroundOverLay.style.display = "block";
        backgroundOverLay.style.animation = "show 0.3s";
        // closeBtn
        closeBtn.style.display = "block";
        closeBtn.style.animation = "show 0.3s";

        bodyNodeHTML.style.overflowY = "hidden";

        //sideMenuIcon.classList.remove("hm-show-icon");
        //sideMenuIcon.classList.add("hm-close-icon");
    }

    function hideSideBarRightEvent() {
        let bodyNodeHTML = document.getElementsByTagName("body")[0];

        document.getElementById("juntoz-sidenav").style.animation = "collapse 0.3s forwards";
        document.getElementById("overlay").style.animation = "hide 0.3s";
        document.getElementById("close-btn").style.animation = "hide 0.3s";

        bodyNodeHTML.style.overflowY = "auto";

        setTimeout(() => {
            document.getElementById("overlay").style.display = "none";
            document.getElementById("close-btn").style.display = "none";
            // Reset Menus
            document.getElementById("first-container").style.animation = "";
            document.getElementById("first-container").style.transform = "translateX(0px)";
            document.getElementById("sub-container").style.animation = "";
            document.getElementById("sub-container").style.transform = "translateX(380px)";
            // change nav icon
            //sideMenuIcon.classList.remove("hm-close-icon");
            //sideMenuIcon.classList.add("hm-show-icon");
        }, 300);
    }
   </script>
  </header>

       <div class="filter-footer">
        <button class="btn btn-block btn-sm" data-bind="click: cleanFilters, disable: isLoading">
         Limpiar filtros

        <button class="btn btn-block btn-orange btn-sm" data-bind="click: applyFilters, disable: isLoading">
         Aplicar
        </button>

       <!-- /ko -->
       <script>
        function searchBrand() {
    var input, filter, ul, li, span, i, txtValue;
    input = document.getElementById("inputSearchBrand");
    filter = input.value.toUpperCase();
    ul = document.getElementById("listOfBrands");
    li = ul.getElementsByTagName("li");
    for (i = 0; i < li.length; i++) {
        span = li[i].getElementsByTagName("span")[0];
        txtValue = span.textContent || span.innerText;
        if (txtValue.toUpperCase().indexOf(filter) > -1) {
            li[i].style.display = "";
        } else {
            li[i].style.display = "none";
        }
    }
}
       </script>
      </div>
     </div>
     <div class="col-xs-12 col-sm-8 col-md-9 col-lg-10">
      <div class="panel-catalog">
       <!-- ko with: catalogBreadcrumb -->
       <div class="panel panel-default catalog-breadcrumb" data-bind="visible: activeFilters().length &gt; 0" style="display: none;">
        <div class="panel-body" data-bind="foreach: activeFilters">
         <span class="label label-default">
          <spann data-bind="text: $data.title + ' ' + $data.name">
          </spann>
          <a data-bind="click: function () { $parent.removeFilter($data) }" href="">
           <i class="fa fa-close">
           </i>
          </a>
         </span>
        </div>
       </div>
       <!-- /ko -->

               </i>
               <span>
                Internacional
               </span>
              </li>
             </ul>
             <button class="btn-add-car" onclick='addToCartFromCatalog(event, {"id":"iphone-13-pink-512-gb-6972037gc020432802202210175207807","productStoreId":1764343,"name":"Iphone 13 Pink 512 Gb","image":"https://juntozstgsrvproduction.blob.core.windows.net/default-blob-images/200x200_gc020431_ 71822.jpg?w=200&amp;h=200","symbol":"S/.","specialPrice":"6,349.00","price":"8,836.00","hasSpecialPrice":true,"maxQuantity":0})'>
              Agregar al carrito
             </button>
            </div>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>

        <style>
         .modal-content {
        padding: 8px 28px;
        width: 700px;
    }

    .content-product {
        display: flex;
        flex-direction: row;
        align-items: center;
        align-items: flex-end;
    }

    .modal-shopping-cart {
        display: flex;
        align-items: center;
        margin: 20px 0px;
        justify-content: space-between;
    }

    .modal-old-price {
        color: #bdbdbd;
        font-size: 14px;
        text-decoration: line-through;
    }

    .modal-current-price {
        color: #b12704;
        font-size: 22px;
        font-weight: 700;
        margin-right: 20px;
    }

    .modal-title {
        margin: 0px 14px;
    }

    #modal-shopping-image {
        max-width: 150px;
        margin: auto;
    }

    .icon-check {
        width: 4%;
    }

    .modal-dialog-centered {
        transform: none;
        max-width: 685px;
        margin: 9.15rem auto;
    }

    .modal-price {
        border-left: none;
        padding: 0px;
        height: 24px;
    }

    .number-addition {
        width: 50px;
        height: 35px;
        text-align: center;
        margin: 0px;
        color: rgb(99 99 99);
        font-size: 1.1rem;
        border-width: 1px;
        border-style: solid;
        border-color: #e3e3e3;
    }

    .modal-label {
        -webkit-box-flex: 1;
        flex-grow: 1;
        line-height: 22px;
        margin-left: 15px;
        margin-right: 30px;
    }

    .label-notice {
        margin-top: 20px;
        margin-bottom: 8px;
    }

        font-size: 1.6rem;
        width: 35px;

        color: rgb(173 173 173);

        border-color: #e3e3e3;
        padding: 0px;

        background-color: rgb(220 220 220);

    }

    }

        margin-left: auto;

        text-decoration: underline;

    @keyframes uil-ring-anim {
        0% {
            -webkit-transform: rotate(0deg);
            transform: rotate(0deg);
        }

        100% {
            -webkit-transform: rotate(360deg);
            transform: rotate(360deg);
        }
    }

    .uil-ring-css > div {
        position: absolute;
        display: block;
        width: 160px;
        height: 160px;
        -webkit-border-radius: 80px;
        -moz-border-radius: 80px;
        -ms-border-radius: 80px;
        border-radius: 80px;
        -webkit-box-shadow: 0 5px 0 0 #18457c;
        -moz-box-shadow: 0 5px 0 0 #18457c;
        -ms-box-shadow: 0 5px 0 0 #18457c;
        box-shadow: 0 5px 0 0 #18457c;
        -webkit-transform-origin: 80px 81.5px;
        transform-origin: 80px 81.5px;
        -webkit-animation: uil-ring-anim 1s linear infinite;
        animation: uil-ring-anim 1s linear infinite;
        margin: 0 auto;
        left: 0;
        right: 0;
        bottom: 0;
        top: 0;
    }

    @media(max-width: 450px) {
        .modal-content {
            width: 100%;
        }

        .modal-label {
            margin-left: 0px;
        }

        .content-product {
            flex-direction: column;

            justify-content: space-between;
            align-items: flex-start;
        }

            margin-left: 0px;
        }

        .add-to-cart {
            flex-direction: column;
        }

            width: 100%;
            height: 55px;
        }

        .continue-shopping {
            margin-left: inherit;
            margin-top: 15px;
        }

        .modal-dialog {
            margin: 120px auto;
        }

        .product-price {
            margin-bottom: 8px;
            margin-top: 8px;
        }

        .modal-open .modal {
            overflow-y: hidden;
        }
    }
        </style>
        <script>
         var sumar = document.getElementById("modal-shopping-add");
    var restar = document.getElementById("modal-shopping-sub");
    var contador = document.getElementById("modal-shopping-quantity");

    function calcular(value) {
        let isValid = /^[0-9][0-9]*$/.test(value);
        if (isValid) {
            let minQuantity = 1;
            let maxQuantity = $("#modal-shopping-cart").data("maxQuantity");
            let modalAlert = $("#modal-alert");

            if (maxQuantity > 0 && value > maxQuantity) {
                sumar.disabled = true;
                modalAlert.show();
            }
            else if (value < minQuantity) {
                restar.disabled = true;
            }
            else {
                contador.value = value;
                sumar.disabled = false;
                restar.disabled = false;
                modalAlert.hide();
                updateCart(value);
            }            
        }
    }

    sumar.onclick = function () {
        value = Number(contador.value) + 1;
        calcular(value);
    };

    restar.onclick = function () {
        value = Number(contador.value) - 1;
        calcular(value);
    };

    function xhrCart(url, data) {
        return $.ajax({
            url: url,
            type: 'POST',
            data: JSON.stringify(data),
            processData: false,
            cache: false,
            contentType: "application/json; charset=utf-8",
            datatype: 'json',
        });
    };

    function updateCart(value) {
        $('#cart__items__preloader').show();

        var seoUrl = $("#modal-shopping-cart").data("id");

        xhrCart('/cart/update/' + seoUrl + '/' + parseInt(value)).done(function (response) {
            if (!response.isSuccess) {
                let errors = [];
                sessionStorage.setItem("hasErrors", "true");
                errors.push(response.message);
                sessionStorage.setItem("errors", JSON.stringify(errors));
            }

            //Get Items Cart
            $.getJSON("/cart/summary", function (data) {
                var total = data.totalItems;
                $('.icon-cart__badge').text(total);
            });

            $('#cart__items__preloader').hide();
        });
    }

    /* for add to Cart from Catalog Components */
    function productClick(id) {
        var products = jzTagManager.qs.getObjectScope("productInfo")
        var item = products.filter(function (i) {
            return i.productStoreId == id;
        })
        jzTagManager.productClick(item[0])
    }

    async function addToCartFromCatalog(event, product) {
        let { id, productStoreId, name, image, symbol, specialPrice, price, hasSpecialPrice, maxQuantity } = product;
        jzTagManager.addToCart();

        let previousValue = event.target.innerHTML;
        event.preventDefault();
        event.target.disabled = true;
        event.target.innerHTML = "<i class='fa fa-refresh fa-spin fa-lg fa-fw'>";

        try {

            let construct = {
                url: '/cart/add',
                data: JSON.stringify({
                    id: id,
                    productStoreId: productStoreId,
                    Qty: 1
                })
            };

            let request = await $.ajax({
                url: construct.url,
                type: 'POST',
                data: construct.data,
                processData: false,
                cache: false,
                contentType: "application/json; charset=utf-8",
                datatype: 'json'
            });

            //Get Items Cart
            let { cartItems, totalItems } = await $.getJSON("/cart/summary");
            let item = cartItems.find(el => el.productStoreId == productStoreId);
            let quantity = item != null ? item.quantity : 1;
            
            $("#modal-shopping-cart").data("id", id);
            $("#modal-shopping-cart").data("maxQuantity", maxQuantity);
            $("#modal-shopping-name").text(name);
            $("#modal-shopping-image").attr("src", image);
            $("#modal-shopping-sprice").text(symbol + specialPrice);
            $("#modal-shopping-price").text(symbol + price);
            if (!hasSpecialPrice) $("#modal-shopping-price").hide();
            $("#modal-shopping-quantity").val(quantity);
            $("#modal-shopping-cart").modal();

            $('.icon-cart__badge').text(totalItems);

        } catch (err) {

            let reason = err.responseJSON;

            if (reason && reason.isSuccess !== "undefined" && reason.isSuccess === false) {
                toastr.warning(reason.message);
            }
            else {
                toastr.error('Hubo un problema, vuelve a intentar por favor.');
            }
        }

        event.target.disabled = false;
        event.target.innerHTML = previousValue;
    }
        </script>
       </div>
       <div class="panel-footer panel-catalog__footer text-center">
        <div class="footer-btn">
         <button class="btn btn-link" data-bind="click: goTop">
          <i class="fa fa-angle-up">
          </i>
          Ir Arriba
         </button>
        </div>
        <div class="pagination-container" data-bind="pagination: { currentPage: page, totalCount: 591, pageSize: size, maxPages: maxPages, directions: directions, boundary: boundary, text: text }, event:{ click: selectPage.bind($data, page()) }">
        </div>
       </div>
       <!-- /ko -->
      </div>
     </div>
    </div>
   </div>
  </section>

  <script>
   function hideSideBarLeftEvent() {
        var filterSidebarLeft = document.getElementById("filter-sidebar-left");
        if (!filterSidebarLeft.classList.contains("closed")) {
            filterSidebarLeft.classList.add("closed");
        }
    }

    document.getElementById("coverit").addEventListener("click", hideSideBarLeftEvent);
  </script>
  <script defer="">
   // Define Modules
        var HeaderComponent = { context: 'header', namespace: 'View.Shared.Components.Header' };

        if (!isMobile) {
            var SearchBarComponent = { context: 'searchBar', namespace: 'Views.Shared.Components.SearchBar', props: { parent: '#searchBar' } };
            var InputSearchComponent = { context: 'inputSearch', namespace: 'Views.Shared.Components.InputSearch', props: { parent: '#searchBar', userId: 'System', userType: 'guest' } };
        } else {
            var SearchBarComponent_Mobile = { context: 'searchBar', namespace: 'Views.Shared.Components.SearchBar', props: { parent: '#searchBarMobile' } };
            var InputSearchComponent_Mobile = { context: 'inputSearch', namespace: 'Views.Shared.Components.InputSearch', props: { parent: '#searchBarMobile', userId: 'System', userType: 'guest' } };
        }

        if (!isMobile) {
            InputSearchComponent.context = 'inputSearchV2';
            InputSearchComponent.namespace = 'Views.Shared.Components.InputSearchV2';
        } else {
            InputSearchComponent_Mobile.context = 'inputSearchV2';
            InputSearchComponent_Mobile.namespace = 'Views.Shared.Components.InputSearchV2';
        }


		const jwBaseUrl = 'https://juntoz-asw-widgets-sdk-production.azurewebsites.net/';

		// Run Modules
        if (!isMobile) {
            AppCore.runModule(SearchBarComponent, "#searchBar", [InputSearchComponent]);

            var navBarFooterComponent = { context: 'navBarFooter', namespace: 'Views.Shared.Components.NavBarFooter' };
            AppCore.runModule(navBarFooterComponent, "#navBarFooter", [navBarFooterComponent]);
        } else {
            AppCore.runModule(SearchBarComponent_Mobile, "#searchBarMobile", [InputSearchComponent_Mobile]);
        }

		// init
		AppCore.init();
  </script>

   //template
        $(".template-slide").each(function () {
            let carousel = $(this).closest(".row").find(".owl-carousel")
            if (carousel) {
                $(this).hide();
            }
        })

        var navbarHeight = document.getElementById('navbar').clientHeight;
        document.getElementById("main-container").style.paddingTop = navbarHeight - 1 + "px";
        document.getElementById("main-container").style.marginTop = "0px";
  </script>
